site_name: Sir Thomas Lipton Memorial Hospital, Osidge, 151 Chase Side, Southgate, N14 5HE
description: Variation of conditions 1 (Approved Plans), 7 (Biodiversity Strategy), 9 (Landscaping), 11 (Drainage), 26 (Car Parking), 30 (Cycle Parking),36 (Refuse Storage) of planning permission 18/5666/FUL dated 29/10/19 for 'Demolition of 3no. existing buildings; Conversion of Osidge House to 11 apartments; Construction of 3 new buildings comprising a three-storey block of 8no. flats, a three-storey block of 3no. townhouses and a two-storey block of 3no. mews houses; Provision of private and communal amenity space, car and cycle parking, refuse and recycling storage with associated hard and soft landscaping.' Variation to include; Alterations to car port and refuse storage structures; Alterations to cycle storage; Changes to landscaping; Revised drainage design I
